feed.title: Red Earth Creek - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 3:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.6°C
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -30.8°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
